mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS LIKE_COUNT, IF( 1 = SUM(CASE WHEN `USR_ID` = #{usrId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), TRUE, FALSE) AS MY_LIKE_FLAG FROM ( SELECT `RSV_IDX`, `PARENT_TYPE`, `PARENT_IDX`, `USR_ID`, `DEL_YN`, `REG_DTTM`, `UPD_DTTM` FROM `POST_RSV` WHERE `DEL_YN` = 'N' AND `PARENT_TYPE` = 'POST' AND `PARENT_IDX` = #{parentIdx} ) AS V;

SELECT `RSV_IDX`, `PARENT_TYPE`, `PARENT_IDX`, `USR_ID`, `DEL_YN`, `REG_DTTM`, `UPD_DTTM` FROM `POST_RSV` WHERE `DEL_YN` = 'N' AND `PARENT_TYPE` = 'POST' AND `PARENT_IDX` = #{parentIdx} AND `RSV_IDX` = LAST_INSERT_ID()

SELECT `RSV_IDX`, `PARENT_TYPE`, `PARENT_IDX`, `USR_ID`, `DEL_YN`, `REG_DTTM`, `UPD_DTTM` FROM `POST_RSV` WHERE `DEL_YN` = 'N' AND `PARENT_TYPE` = 'POST' AND `PARENT_IDX` = #{parentIdx} AND `USR_ID` = #{usrId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `POST_RSV` ( `PARENT_TYPE`, `PARENT_IDX`, `USR_ID`, `REG_DTTM`, `UPD_DTTM` ) VALUES ( 'POST', #{parentIdx}, #{usrId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DEL_YN="N", UPD_DTTM=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
mapper.update: UPDATE `POST_RSV` SET `DEL_YN` = 'Y', `UPD_DTTM` = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE `DEL_YN` = 'N' AND `PARENT_TYPE` = 'POST' AND `PARENT_IDX` = #{parentIdx} AND `USR_ID` = #{usrId}
